questions.question: What is the correct form? 'If it _____ tomorrow, we will cancel the picnic.'
Which of these sentences is an example of the first conditional?
options: If she studies hard, she will pass the exam.
If she studied hard, she would pass the exam.
If she had studied, she would have passed.
questions.answer: If she studies hard, she will pass the exam.
